thread.section_title: OptiContacts.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of OptiContacts.com | opticontacts.com | 7 of 541
thread.title: PDT

author: PDT
title: PDT
text: Consistently the best price for my contacts. I have shopped several different sites each time I order contacts for the past year+, OptiContacts always has the best price! My order usually arrives faster than expected and I have always been happy with my order, service, and the post-order follow-up. Sending my prescription in for verification has been fast and easy, unlike my experiences with other websites. OptiContacts is now my #1 choice for ordering contact lenses online.
